titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Fleming brought a party of Highlanders to the Abbey after Evensong: and in the failing daylight I shewed them round. They seemed interested.
Ella returned from Scotland. I met the train at Euston. We arrived in Dean's Yard about 11.30 p.m.
